entry.title: Correct Way to Apply Thermal Paste

media:group.media:title: Correct Way to Apply Thermal Paste
media:group.media:description: Linus Tech Tips explains the correct way to apply thermal paste for consistent CPU cooling. This video shows how much paste to use and which method gives the best contact with your processor. If you want stable temperatures and reliable performance, this guide covers the essentials.

entry.title: When you do such a bad job the company flies a guy out to fix your stuff

media:group.media:title: When you do such a bad job the company flies a guy out to fix your stuff
media:group.media:description:
Check out Threatlocker’s cybersecurity event ZTW 2026 and save $200 on registration using our code ZTWLTT26 at: https://ztw.com/
The audio solution we cooked up at the combination -pizza hut and taco bell- LAN Gaming and Badminton Centre has it's fair share of problems. So many that Q-SYS actually sent someone out to help us take our PA system with PoE speakers from "somewhat bumpin" to "Tubthumpin". If that makes any sense.... What I'm saying is they made it better. Okay? And you'd be surprised at just how complex a seemingly simple PA system can get.
Learn more about QSYS: https://www.qsys.com/
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1626506-when-you-do-such-a-bad-job-the-company-flies-a-guy-out-to-fix-your-stuff/

entry.title: Liquid Metal Killed my Laptop… Now What?

media:group.media:title: Liquid Metal Killed my Laptop… Now What?
media:group.media:description:
Use our code below to get a 20% OFF discount directly on PLAUD products in the links below. This is the largest discount of the year—enjoy your Black Friday Cyber Monday (BFCM) savings in advance! Plaud NotePin (20%OFF with code TechTips): https://bit.ly/4hOFmzw Plaud NotePin Amazon (20%OFF with code LINUSYTB): https://amzn.to/4p2vuoi
Shop now at LTTStore to enter the Holiday Loot Drop: http://lmg.gg/lootdrop
Did liquid metal kill this ASUS ROG Flow X13 gaming laptop? Watch as Linus attempts a risky DIY repair on his dead laptop. Can he clean up the conductive liquid metal spill and bring it back to life? We're diving into the internal hardware, discussing thermal performance, and replacing the dangerous liquid metal with PTM7950 to see if this ASUS ROG machine is salvageable. PC repair and tech teardown drama!
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1626365-liquid-metal-killed-my-laptop%E2%80%A6-now-what/

entry.title: Something is Living in my Pool-Cooled Gaming PC

media:group.media:title: Something is Living in my Pool-Cooled Gaming PC
media:group.media:description:
Visit https://www.squarespace.com/LTT and use offer code LTT for 10% off
A cloud that’s cheaper than your coffee! Get US$ / € 20 off on your Hetzner Cloud! https://htznr.li/LTT2511
Shop now at LTTStore to enter the Holiday Loot Drop: http://lmg.gg/lootdrop
It's starting to seem like cooling a bunch of Gaming PCs with your swimming pool might be a little high-maintenance. The corrosion problem is solved, but now something smells pretty funky in the pool-based PC cooling system. It's all hands on deck as we pull apart the LAN Center PCs and try to eliminate whatever is growing in the cooling loops once and for all.

entry.title: Maybe This Phone ISN’T Just for Criminals - Trying Graphene OS for a Month.

media:group.media:title: Maybe This Phone ISN’T Just for Criminals - Trying Graphene OS for a Month.
media:group.media:description:
Join us and over 70 million players in one of the most comprehensive vehicle combat games EVER MADE! Check out War Thunder for free today on PC, Console, and Mobile using our links!
PC/Console: https://playwt.link/linustechtips Mobile: https://wtm.game/linustechtips
Some might say "if you have nothing to hide, you have nothing to fear" and just go about their daily lives, blissfully unconcerned. For the rest of us, there's GrapheneOS, the secure, open-source mobile OS built on Android’s AOSP that puts the user back in charge! But it sounds too good to be true... An end to corporate spyware and bloatware draining your phone’s performance and compromising your data? What's the cost? Is Linus ready to pay it?
Check out Graphene OS at https://grapheneos.org/
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1626070-i-tried-the-criminals-phone-of-choice-for-a-month/

entry.title: Terrible News, Cloud Gaming is Good Now

media:group.media:title: Terrible News, Cloud Gaming is Good Now
media:group.media:description:
DeleteMe International Plans: https://international.joindeleteme.com/ Get 20% off DeleteMe US consumer plans when you go to http://joindeleteme.com/LTT20 and use promo code LTT20 at checkout.
DeleteMe International Plans: https://international.joindeleteme.com/
You OWN your gaming hardware? In 2025?? Cloud gaming has come a LONG way and Nvidia’s GeForce NOW is actually… pretty good. But that doesn’t necessarily mean that it’s a good thing.
